it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.spot

Class Spot

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.spot.Spot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Spot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    A spot consists of:
    • the mention (i.e. the common anchor used to link the entities)
    • the list of entities related to the current mention in the knowledge base
    • the frequency of the mention: how many times the mention occurs in the collection (as link or simple text)
    • the link frequency of the mention: how many times the mention occurs in the collection as a link to an entity
    • the idf score of the mentions
    The spot is not document related, but collection related.
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli, diego.ceccarelli@isti.cnr.it
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Spot(java.lang.String spot, java.util.List<Entity> entities, int link, int freq)
      Creates the spot, and associates the entities that can be referred by the mention, how many times the mention occurs as an anchor-text in Wikipedia and how many articles that contain the mention as anchor or simple text (i.e. document frequency of the spot).

      • Spot

        public Spot(java.lang.String spot,
            java.util.List<Entity> entities,
            int link,
            int freq)
        Creates the spot, and associates the entities that can be referred by the mention, how many times the mention occurs as an anchor-text in Wikipedia and how many articles that contain the mention as anchor or simple text (i.e. document frequency of the spot).
        Parameters:
        spot - The string representing the spot;
        entities - The list of entities that can be refered by the spot;
        link - How many times the spot occurs in wikipedia as anchor text;
        freq - How many articles that contain the text mention as anchor or simple text (i.e. document frequency of the spot).

      • getEntityCommonness

        public double getEntityCommonness(Entity e)
        Computes the entity commonness for a given entity and this spot, i.e., P(e|s), the probability for an entity to be associated with this spot. It is computed dividing the number of times that the spot links to the entity by the frequency of spot as anchor.
        Parameters:
        e - The entity for which to compare the commmonness
        Returns:
        The

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        Encodes this spot in a array of byte, the encode consists in:
        • 1 byte, containing the length of the mention (it is assumed that the length n of the mention is less than 256)
        • n bytes, containing the mention encoded in ascii
        • 4 bytes, containing the frequency of the mention as link
        • 4 bytes, containing the document frequency of the mention
        • 2 x 4 x m bytes, where m is the number of entities associated with the mention, containing for each entity its unique id and its frequency (number of anchors with this text that link to the entity);
        Returns:
        the encoded byte array

      • fromByteArray

        public static Spot fromByteArray(java.lang.String text,
                                 byte[] data)
        Decodes a Spot from a byte representation, if the given text match the spot text encoded in the byte array.
        Parameters:
        text - - the spot text to decode
        data - - the binary rep for the spot
        Returns:
        A spot if the given string text matches the text of the spot encoded in data, otherwise null
        See Also:
        toByteArray

      • toTsv

        public java.lang.String toTsv()
        Returns a tab separated version of the spot in a string. The string contains:
        • the entity ids of the possible entities for this spot, encoded in esadecimal
        • the frequencies of the each entity for this spot, encoded in esadecimal
        • the frequency of the spot as anchor text
        • the document frequency of the spot in the collection
        Returns:
        the tab separated representation of this spot

      • fromTsvLine

        public static Spot fromTsvLine(java.lang.String text)
        Decodes a tab separated representation of a spot.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
        the spot encoded in text.
        See Also:
        toTsv
